item.title: Everyday Americans Are Feeling Worse About the Job Market
item.description: Worker confidence for finding a new job or avoiding a layoff are both falling.

item.title: How This AI Company Is Angling to Score a Government Contract
item.description: Perplexity just launched an AI service geared towards the U.S. government. It’s not the first AI company to do so.

item.title: Pinterest’s Male Audience Is Booming. Here’s What They’re Searching For
item.description: Pinterest now counts more than 171 million male users, driven by Gen Z interest in wellness, grooming, AI tools, and fatherhood content.

item.title: How to Hire When Your Startup Needs to Grow Up
item.description: Many ‘lateral hires’ are complicated and expensive—whether they work out or not.

item.title: To Rebuild American Manufacturing, We Need to Start Small
item.description: Small-scale manufacturers must lead the charge as we re-shore America’s production capabilities. Here’s why.
